app_descript:
Jelly Dye

Brief

Immerse yourself in the vibrant and soothing world of Jelly Dye, where creativity meets relaxation in a symphony of colors. This intriguing simulation game allows players to indulge in the simple pleasure of injecting color into various shapes of jelly, watching as they transform into mesmerizing spectacles of color. Perfect for unwinding after a long day or just to pass the time creatively, Jelly Dye promises an experience that's both engaging and calming.
